document_data.name: Jamina al-Mubarak
document_data.home: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamina al-Mubarak''' was an inhabitant of the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities:
Jamila served as the ambassador Extraordinary of the [[Brotherhood of the True Flame]] within the [[efreeti]] city. As such, she handled the business of the Brotherhood within the City of Brass when the [[Nar-Aidiya|Bonfire]] was not present, which was most of the time.

Her main focus was recruiting new talent from the efreeti into the Brotherhood.
document_data.Relationships: The efreet tolerated Jamila's presence but largely resented her, viewing her as nothing more than a foreigner despite her great power over [[Flame (province)|flame magic]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Jamila was believed to be involved in a romantic relationship with her assistant [[Sefer al-Raq]].
